data.message: He's not retiring! Listen to psychopath killer and die alone for proof! Also, he put '15 more years' on his page when shadyxv came out! Let's hope he stays in the rap game for many more years to come! Like this comment to spread the news he ain't going nowhere (and like if you love shady!!)

replies.message: He's gotta get off soon I've been a fan most of my life but every person gotta have the break from the daily grind he's great at what he does it just seems stressful for him being constantly prodded for more
